extendedInfo.description: As the pace of change accelerates across an expanding spectrum of platforms, technologists in the market research industry are hard-pressed to stay ahead of the curve. That's why industry professionals rely on the CASRO Technology Conference to learn how to implement the latest, most effective technologies in the market research space. For years this event has been broadly acclaimed for featuring detailed explanations and demonstrations of real world solutions and collaboration among companies. Presentations are chosen by an objective committee of expert practitioners for their value and applicability on such topics as: Data Visualization and Storytelling, Big Data, Gamification, Mobile, Social Networks, Analysis of Social Media, and Emerging Technologies.
